meanings.definition: Make a loud, resonant sound, as of a gong.
meanings.sent1: The gonging of the bell echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys gonging the drum during music class.
meanings.sent3: The gonging of the doorbell startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent4: His laughter gonged through the room, contagious and joyful.
meanings.sent5: The gonging of the thunderstorm was both frightening and mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The act of striking a gong to produce a loud, resonant sound.
meanings.sent1: The gonging at the ceremony signaled the beginning of the event.
meanings.sent2: The musician's gonging added a unique touch to the performance.
meanings.sent3: The gonging at the temple was so loud it startled the pigeons.
meanings.sent4: The gonging of the clock marked the passing of each hour.
meanings.sent5: The gonging of the gong created a mesmerizing atmosphere in the room.
